original_title: Devin Lewis: Boys Just Want to Have Fun
overview: Devin Lewis: Boys Just Want to Have Fun features Devin Lewis in four scenes: Lock Out, Cock Out with Tommy Hunter, Rinsed and Ravished with DJ Black, Roughhouse Arousal with Jake Olsen, and Tricks of the Trade with Jared Shaw.
title: Devin Lewis: Boys Just Want to Have Fun
